Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Catahoula Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #1 -- Disabled Veterans Homestead Exp. - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in Catahoula Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of Catahoula Parish voting on this proposition?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #2 -- 8 mills - PJ - 10 yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 8 mills property tax renewal for supporting the general fund of the Police Jury of Catahoula Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of eight (8) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $282,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of supporting the general fund of the Police Jury of the Parish?
